title: Schleich Unveils Global Sustainability Initiative - The Toy Book
summary: James Zahn, AKA The Rock Father, is an experienced pop culture and toy industry expert with over 30 years of experience in entertainment, retail, and publishing industries. He has been featured as a panelist and guest at various events and has provided expert commentary for numerous publications and media outlets.
